thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel and amazing location
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel and amazing location - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Tara R
title: Lovely hotel and amazing location
text: I have stayed at the Iroquois twice before, this last trip; which I bookended with 2 stays before and after a trip to Paris. Both rooms were clean and well appointed, but the bathrooms are starting to show some age. The beds are very comfortable and the rooms are quiet. All of the staff is very friendly and accommodating and (IMO)it is a perfect location to theaters, restaurants, and transportation.
